item.title: Exploring OAuth

item.title: Hammering JSON into CSV
item.description: json-to-smart-csv is a tool to help build CSV records from arbitrary JSON…

item.title: Your own map server
item.description: A quick guide to running your own tile server, with a geo database populated from OpenStreetMap data.

item.title: 3D puzzle print: a crossword generation tool
item.description:
A tool to design 3D printed crossword puzzles.

Generating 3D crossword models

I’ve been working on a tool to generate crossword designs using OpenSCAD. The output is an STL file that you can use with your favourite slicer and send to a 3D printer. It’s open source, and you’re free to plunder it for tips, techniques, or to generate your own…

item.description: Presenting a simple template to develop, publish, and test a simple C# service backend on AWS, with serverless Lambda functions, supported by DynamoDb, behind an API Gateway, and protected by Cognito auth.

item.title: Querying data files with terminal tools
item.description: There are a many ways to peek inside a data file and reason about its contents. This post is about a triplet of simple, easily available tools that I’ve found handy for searching and querying common data file formats. You might too…

item.title: Keeping jobs alive with caffeine
item.description: My Mac likes to go to sleep to save power, and that means any long-running processes I have underway will be suspended when it does.

item.title: Drive Stamper
item.description:
This is a necropost, resurrected from an old blog.

Drive Stamper

Drive Stamper is one of the first projects I released into the wild, and helped me to kick off my old blog in 2011.
